name: Isolation (itch) (Ty Nix)
description:
You wake up in this nightmare world. It is cold, it is bright, and there are what look to be flying saucers everywhere. Escape the shadow figures while exploring the homes, churches, and fields that have been left behind by those who were taken. The player's objective is to turn off all the glowing red beacons located in various areas of the forest and snowy mountains while avoiding the shadows that follow. Can you escape the nightmare or will the nightmare catch up and consume you?

Follow for more upcoming games:
